entry.title: Friday night: Flurries. Low minus 14.
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. 40 percent chance of flurries early this evening. Flurries beginning early this evening and ending after midnight. Local blowing snow this evening. Wind east 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light near midnight. Low minus 14. Wind chill minus 8 this evening and minus 20 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MST Friday 10 March 2023

entry.title: Saturday: Chance of flurries. High minus 6. POP 60%
